diagapplet.utils

Class StandAloneApplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • diagapplet.utils.StandAloneApplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    rcsDesignGui

    public class StandAloneApplet
extends java.awt.Container
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    Wrapper that allows a class to be run as an applet or standalone outside a browser.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
